word_group.brief_definition: 世界各地；整个世界；纵观世界
这一年中；在这一年中；这一年
自始至终谈判；全面谈判；全面协商
建设过程中；建立过程中
在整个十八世纪九十年代

bilingual.source: His fame spread throughout the entire city.
bilingual.target: 他的名声遍及整个城市。

bilingual.source: This plant is found throughout the entire forest.
bilingual.target: 这种植物遍及整个森林。

bilingual.source: His works are available throughout major libraries.
bilingual.target: 他的作品遍及各大图书馆。

bilingual.source: The influence of this movie is felt throughout the world.
bilingual.target: 这部电影的影响力遍及全球。

bilingual.source: The branches of this chain store are throughout the country.
bilingual.target: 这家连锁店的分店遍及全国。

bilingual.source: The marchesa's influence extended throughout the region.
bilingual.target: 女侯爵的影响力遍及整个地区。

bilingual.source: Throughout more than 20 overseas countries and regions …
bilingual.target: 遍及了海外20多个国家和地区…

bilingual.source: Your graduates are spread throughout China and around the world.
bilingual.target: 贵校的毕业生遍及中国和全世界.

bilingual.source: Customers throughout Canada, japan and the United States.
bilingual.target: 客户遍及美国、加拿大、日本等国度。

bilingual.source: Eurasian annual sprawling plant naturalized throughout North America.
bilingual.target: 遍及北美的繁殖性强的一种欧亚两年生植物.

list.abstract: throughout，（英 [θruːˈaʊt]，美 [θruːˈaʊt]）。英文单词，指贯穿、遍及、到处。短语搭配“spread throughout（蔓延）”。例句“They keep dividing throughout one's life.（他们在一生中不断分裂）”。 throughout的副词近义词around、wholly、about，介词近义词为over all。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, our culture worshiped the aggressor throughout the ages.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，许多世代以来，我们文化中对侵略过度崇拜。

yingyinNormal.en: Ronan is destroying Xandarian outposts throughout the galaxy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗南摧毁银河各地的柴达基地。

yingyinNormal.en: Throughout the Commonwealth, there were equally joyful celebrations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 整个英联邦也充满了同等的喜悦。

yingyinNormal.en: Holy oil from the pontiff who wishes to spread Christianity throughout my lands.
yingyinNormal.zh: 圣油，罗马教皇希望以此将基督教义传播到我的国土。

yingyinNormal.en: In doing so, I have weakened your position before Karakorum and throughout China.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样做，已经在哈拉和林和整个中原面前消弱了您的地位。

yingyinNormal.en: The Great Genghis, he of the wolf, dreamed of a Mongol empire stretching throughout all of China.
yingyinNormal.zh: 成吉思汗，狼之后裔，梦想蒙古帝国一统中原。

yingyinNormal.en: From our humble beginnings, and throughout the past 15 years, Alibaba has changed commerce in China.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从我们最初很单纯的一个小期望开始，如今十五年过去了，阿里巴巴已经改变了中国电子商务的模式。

yingyinNormal.en: Yet still the officials at court and the soldiers throughout the realm remain loyal to you, your majesty.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然侍卫之臣不懈于内，忠志之士忘身于外者，

yingyinNormal.en: Step 4: Buy new, red clothes to wear throughout the Chinese New Year celebration. The color is considered lucky.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第四步：买一些中国新年要穿来庆祝节日的红色新衣服，红色被认为是幸运的颜色。

yingyinNormal.en: Chinese New Year, also known as Lunar New Year, is celebrated throughout the world in late January or early February.
yingyinNormal.zh: 中国新年，又被称作农历新年，世界各地都在一月下旬或者二月上旬庆祝这个节日。

yingyinNormal.en: Step into the Main Concourse, and feel the echo of every tearful farewell and joyous greeting throughout the station's history.
yingyinNormal.zh: 车站建成以来，步入中央大堂都可以感受到每一个挥泪告别和快乐重逢的情景。

yingyinNormal.en: Yet even that pales into insignificance when compared to what the whole of the plant kingdom has done throughout the history of our planet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但较之于地球发展史中，植物王国的辉煌贡献，这不过是沧海一粟。

yingyinNormal.en: Your union has been advised. ACARS data relayed that the left engine continued to turn throughout the flight. Then the ACARS data is wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们的工会已被告知，飞机通信寻址与报告系统的传输数据显示，左翼发动机在整个飞行期间一直在转动。那飞机通信寻址与报告系统的数据错了。

yingyinNormal.en: And I know a lot of people use bronzer after they've powdered, but I like to put on before because that really doesn't rub off throughout the day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道很多人都是在涂粉之后才使用修容粉饼，但是我喜欢在之前使用，因为这样一整天都不会脱妆。

yingyinNormal.en: In perpetuity all throughout the universe and all alternate universes except for those universes where owning a couch is forbidden by the hive queen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在所有宇宙中永远都是我的，平行宇宙中也是，除了那些虫族母皇下令禁止拥有沙发的宇宙里。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't be afraid to take sips throughout your speech. It will keep your voice natural and it gives you a moment to pause and regain your composure if needed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不要担心在演讲中途喝水，这可以保持声音清澈，也可以给自己点时间休息，或是让自己放松。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: And the problem is that despite their good intentions, they still end up procrastinating tremendously throughout the semester and paying a big price for that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 问题在于虽然学生们本意是想按时完成，但最后他们总是一拖再拖，直到学期结束并为此付出沉重代价。

yingyinNormal.en: In the beginning, you can only eat about two ounces at a time, so you'll need to eat six small meals throughout the day to get all the nutrients that you need.
yingyinNormal.zh: 刚开始，你每次只能吃约六十克的食物，所以你每天需要吃六顿小餐才能获取足够的营养。

yingyinNormal.en: We all know that we are better than the cynicism and the pessimism that is regurgitated throughout Washington, and the 24-hour cable news cycle, not my channel by the way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们知道，我们要好过华盛顿政府以及24小时循环播放的有线新闻中的犬儒主义与厌世主义，还好不是我的频道。

yingyinNormal.en: Throughout history, most currency, including the US dollar, was linked to valuable commodities and the amount of it in circulation depended on a government's gold or silver reserves.
yingyinNormal.zh: 历史上大多数的货币，包括美元都和有价商品连结，也和流通量相关，都依据政府的金银储备量而定。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: prep.&adv. 贯穿；遍及；到处；自始至终

word_family.mean: prep. 穿过；从…一端到另一端；一直到底；达到…的末尾；完成；从头到尾检查；直至；经由；接通电话；下承式

sense_info_list.en: from beginning to end of an event or period of time

examination_example.sentence: This is a skill that will help them all <highlight>throughout</highlight> life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一项终生帮助他们的技能。

examination_example.sentence: Take a "journalistic" approach to seizing moments of deep work when you can <highlight>throughout</highlight> the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 采取“新闻工作者”的方法，抓住一天中能抓住的深度工作时刻。

examination_example.sentence: Two paradoxes exist <highlight>throughout</highlight> this credibility process.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在整个可信度过程中存在两个悖论。

sense_info_list.en: in every part of a place or object

examination_example.sentence: Renaissance ideas had spread <highlight>throughout</highlight> Europe well into the 17th century.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 文艺复兴的思想一直传播到17世纪的整个欧洲。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 穿越, 从头至尾, 到底
外面的, 在外, 向
外面的, 熄灭的, 结束的

word_usage.usage: throughout作介词时，其后常接名词，如：throughout the world；throughout作副词时，常用于句尾，如：The house was painted white throughout. 整个房子都漆成了白色。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: prep.&adv. 贯穿；遍及；到处；自始至终

word_family.mean: prep. 穿过；从…一端到另一端；一直到底；达到…的末尾；完成；从头到尾检查；直至；经由；接通电话；下承式

sense_info_list.en: from beginning to end of an event or period of time

examination_example.sentence: This thereby leads them to expect the same kind of spoilt treatment <highlight>throughout</highlight> their adult lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，这导致他们在成年后的生活中期待同样被宠坏的待遇。

examination_example.sentence: About that same time and <highlight>throughout</highlight> adulthood, the information you receive also refine your attitudes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大约在同一时期和整个成年期，你所接收到的信息也会改善你的态度。

examination_example.sentence: Although these may not seem like large effects, the impact of early attention problems continued <highlight>throughout</highlight> the children's academic careers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这些影响看似不大，但早期注意力问题的影响贯穿了孩子们的整个学习生涯。

sense_info_list.en: in every part of a place or object

examination_example.sentence: Agencies <highlight>throughout</highlight> the world are working on developing technology that would dispose of or capture space debris before it causes serious damage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全世界的许多机构都在致力于开发可以处理或捕获太空碎片的技术，以防止碎片造成严重损伤。

外面的, 在外, 向
外面的, 熄灭的, 结束的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: prep.&adv. 贯穿；遍及；到处；自始至终

word_family.mean: prep. 穿过；从…一端到另一端；一直到底；达到…的末尾；完成；从头到尾检查；直至；经由；接通电话；下承式

sense_info_list.en: from beginning to end of an event or period of time

examination_example.sentence: A balanced breakfast is really helpful, but getting regular meals <highlight>throughout</highlight> the day is more important to leave blood sugar stable through the day, which helps control weight and hunger levels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 均衡的早餐真的很有帮助，但一整天的规律饮食，对保持全天血糖稳定更重要，而且有助于控制体重和饥饿水平。

examination_example.sentence: The effectiveness of integrating it with one's abilities, may increase <highlight>throughout</highlight> all of adulthood if there are no diseases.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果没有疾病，将其与个人能力相结合的有效性可能会在整个成年期增加。

examination_example.sentence: The growing popularity of electronic medical records has forced hospital-based doctors to become dependent on computers <highlight>throughout</highlight> the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电子病历的日益普及迫使医院医生全天依赖于电脑。

sense_info_list.en: in every part of a place or object

examination_example.sentence: Tourism <highlight>throughout</highlight> Turkey is expected to fall this year as the country has been the victim of several deadly terrorist attacks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于土耳其已成为数起致命恐怖袭击的受害者，今年该国各地的旅游业预计都将下滑。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 穿越, 从头至尾, 到底
外面的, 在外, 向
外面的, 熄灭的, 结束的

word_usage.usage: throughout用于时间，相当于through，但比它更强调整体、全部，语气更强；用于空间、地点时，相当于all over. 如：throughout the world全世界；throughout one's life在某人一生中。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: prep.&adv. 贯穿；遍及；到处；自始至终

word_family.mean: prep. 穿过；从…一端到另一端；一直到底；达到…的末尾；完成；从头到尾检查；直至；经由；接通电话；下承式

sense_info_list.en: from beginning to end of an event or period of time

examination_example.sentence: Just keep music playing <highlight>throughout</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只需始终播放音乐即可。

examination_example.sentence: After you exercise, you continue to burn calories <highlight>throughout</highlight> the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 运动后，你一整天都在燃烧卡路里。

examination_example.sentence: While verbs (动词) may seem dull, most of the fun things they do <highlight>throughout</highlight> their lives will be verbs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然动词似乎很枯燥，但他们自己一生中做的大多数有趣的事情都和动词有关。

examination_example.sentence: Hough Bakeries, at Easter time, made little bunny (兔子) cakes for all its stores <highlight>throughout</highlight> Cleveland.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 霍夫面包店，在复活节期间，为克利夫兰的所有商店制作了小兔子蛋糕。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 穿越, 从头至尾, 到底
外面的, 在外, 向
外面的, 熄灭的, 结束的

word_usage.usage: throughout用于时间，相当于through，但比它更强调整体、全部，语气更强；用于空间、地点时，相当于all over. 如：throughout the world全世界；throughout one's life在某人一生中。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: prep.&adv. 贯穿；遍及；到处；自始至终

word_family.mean: prep. 穿过；从…一端到另一端；一直到底；达到…的末尾；完成；从头到尾检查；直至；经由；接通电话；下承式

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 世界各地；整个世界；纵观世界

sense_info_list.en: in or into every part of something

examination_example.sentence: She traveled <highlight>throughout</highlight> the Middle East by herself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她独自一人在中东各地旅行。

examination_example.sentence: By the mid-1800s, there were many types of restaurants <highlight>throughout</highlight> the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到19世纪中期，世界各地的餐馆种类繁多。

examination_example.sentence: Gradually,the letter grading system became more popular <highlight>throughout</highlight> the US.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 渐渐地，信件分级系统在全美变得更加流行。

sense_info_list.en: from beginning to end of an event or period of time

examination_example.sentence: A theme is a central idea running <highlight>throughout</highlight> the text, connecting the characters and events.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 主题是贯穿全文的中心思想，连接人物和事件。

examination_example.sentence: As a result, you will eat more healthily <highlight>throughout</highlight> the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样一来，你一整天都会吃得更健康。

examination_example.sentence: Instead, a whole culture helps shape the changing stories <highlight>throughout</highlight> history.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，一种完整的文化有助于塑造整个历史上不断变化的故事。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 穿越, 从头至尾, 到底
外面的, 在外, 向
外面的, 熄灭的, 结束的
